title: Language issue
body:
I wonder is it difficult to add language packs?
A lot of people ask it for long time. However, RIOT has never tried it.
Please add language pack to Oceania server. Especially, Korean language is really urgent.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=dragon poo,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=xjH1sA5z,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-12T06:57:46.849+0000)
>
> Arent there korean servers?

I guess there are Koreans that live in the OCE region.  Playing in a foreign server will result in a higher delay, significantly reducing accuracy of skill shots and last hitting.

> [{quoted}](name=tts01008,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=xjH1sA5z,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-12T07:17:49.415+0000)
>
> I guess there are Koreans that live in the OCE region.  Playing in a foreign server will result in a higher delay, significantly reducing accuracy of skill shots and last hitting.

i wonder if other regions have this issue.

is there english language packs on korean server? genuine question.
